caller_intent: The caller (Corbin from the commercial department) sought to send proof of insurance after issuing a policy and inquired about alternative methods if the system couldn't generate it automatically.
resolution_steps: Michelle confirmed the caller's intent and acknowledged the policy issuance.
Michelle explained that the agency can manually issue a certificate of insurance.
The caller accepted this solution and ended the conversation.
knowledge_required: Process for issuing certificates of insurance manually through the agency system
Understanding of policy issuance workflows and proof-of-insurance requirements
systems_referenced: Agency automation system (implied through reference to 'issuing a certificate of insurance from your agency')
summary: Corbin from the commercial department contacted Auto Owners Insurance to resolve an issue with proof of insurance after policy issuance. Michelle explained that the agency can manually generate a certificate of insurance, which Corbin accepted as a solution. The call concluded with both parties agreeing to this workaround.
